app.name: Day-End Boxes
app.description: Discover discounted end-of-day food boxes from local restaurants, bakeries, and supermarkets in Lebanon

welcome.title: Welcome to Day-End Boxes
welcome.subtitle: Your gateway to affordable, delicious food while fighting waste
welcome.description: Join thousands of Lebanese food lovers saving money and the environment, one box at a time.

step1.title: Discover
step1.description: Browse nearby restaurants, bakeries, and supermarkets offering discounted boxes

step2.title: Reserve
step2.description: Reserve your surprise box for pickup during the specified time window

step3.title: Enjoy
step3.description: Pick up your box and enjoy quality food at up to 70% off regular prices

save_money.title: Save Money
save_money.description: Get premium food at discounted prices - up to 70% off!

reduce_waste.title: Fight Food Waste
reduce_waste.description: Help local businesses reduce waste while enjoying great meals

support_local.title: Support Local
support_local.description: Support your favorite Lebanese restaurants and bakeries

surprise_meals.title: Surprise Meals
surprise_meals.description: Discover new flavors with curated surprise boxes

phone_verification.title: Enter Your Phone Number
phone_verification.subtitle: We'll send you a verification code to confirm your number
phone_verification.terms_agreement: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

errors.invalid_phone: Please enter a valid Lebanese phone number
errors.invalid_otp: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
errors.otp_expired: Verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.too_many_attempts: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
errors.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.

location_permission.title: Location Access Required
location_permission.description: We need your location to show nearby available boxes

no_location.title: Location Not Available
no_location.description: Please enable location services to find boxes near you

no_boxes.title: No Boxes Available
no_boxes.description: No boxes found in your area. Try expanding your search radius or check back later.

no_results.title: No Results Found
no_results.description: Try adjusting your filters or search terms

confirmation.title: Reservation Confirmed!
confirmation.subtitle: Your box is reserved for {duration} minutes
confirmation.bring_code: • Bring this pickup code to the merchant

errors.already_reserved: You already have an active reservation with this merchant
errors.box_unavailable: This box is no longer available
errors.network_error: Failed to create reservation. Please try again.

reservation_confirmed.title: Reservation Confirmed!
reservation_confirmed.body: Your box from {merchant} is reserved. Pickup: {time}

reservation_reminder.title: Pickup Reminder
reservation_reminder.body: Don't forget to pickup your box from {merchant} by {time}

reservation_expiring.title: Reservation Expiring Soon
reservation_expiring.body: Your reservation at {merchant} expires in 10 minutes

new_boxes_available.title: New Boxes Available!
new_boxes_available.body: Check out fresh boxes from your favorite merchants

generic.title: Oops! Something went wrong
generic.description: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again.

network.title: Connection Problem
network.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

server.title: Server Error
server.description: Our servers are temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

not_found.title: Not Found
not_found.description: The content you're looking for is not available.

permission_denied.title: Permission Required
permission_denied.description: This feature requires additional permissions to work properly.
